title: My chocolate cupcakes
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder', '200g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt (optional)', '100g butter, softened', '3 eggs', '150ml milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon yoghurt', 'Buttercream', '75g butter', '150g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder']
